#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(void)
{  int t;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  {
      int a,t1=0,t2=1,flag=0;
      cin>>a;
      if(a==t1 || a==t2)
      {
          flag=1;
      }
      else
      {
          while(t2<=a)
          {

            int temp;
            temp=t1;
            t1=t2;
            t2=t2+temp;
            if(a==t2)
            {
                flag=1;
            }

          }

      }

    if(flag==1)
    {
        cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
    }
    else
    cout<<"No"<<endl;



  }

return 0;
}
